New Records: Kylian Mbappé finally scored his first goal in a EURO final
Key Match Events: Poland goalkeeper Łukasz Skorupski made six excellent saves
Kylian Mbappé scored a second-half penalty to equalize the score
Robert Lewandowski converted a penalty after a foul by Dayot Upamecano
Poland exited the group stage despite their efforts
Post-Match Reflections: Didier Deschamps praised Łukasz Skorupski's performance and said France's inability to win the group was not a disappointment
Michał Probierz thanked the fans and expressed pride in the team's effort
Łukasz Skorupski expressed confidence in his ability to take over as Poland's goalkeeper if needed
Miscellaneous Highlights: France had not won their final group match in any of their last nine major tournaments
France were through to the knockout phase for the seventh time in the last eight EUROs
Robert Lewandowski became the third player to score in four successive EUROs
